meanings.sent1: The children played happily in the snowland.
meanings.sent2: We visited a beautiful snowland during our winter vacation.
meanings.sent3: The snowland looked like a giant vanilla ice cream cone.
meanings.sent4: The snowland stretched out like a soft white blanket.
meanings.sent5: The snowland sparkled under the winter sun.

meanings.sent1: We need to snowland the mountains before the ski season starts.
meanings.sent2: The storm will snowland the entire town overnight.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally snowlanded my friend during our snowball fight.
meanings.sent4: The snowstorm will snowland the landscape in a frosty embrace.
meanings.sent5: The snowfall will gently snowland the trees in the forest.
